scripts.build: copy-files base/* build && content output content build/content && assets css/index.css js/index.js build/bundle && framework render js/fixtures.js js/component.js build/200.html --selector html && optimize 'build/**/*.html' && rimraf build/200.html
scripts.watch: rimraf build && (copy-files base/* build -w & content output content build/content -w & assets css/index.css js/index.js build/bundle -w --no-min & serve-files build --default 200 --open)
